name: Simple Space Scroller
description:
A Simple Space Scroller made for LOWREZJAM 2022 by Kevin Griggs.

Collect dust, avoid obstacles, shoot asteroids.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Fire

Escape - Quit

Attributions:

Asteroids sprites scaled down from original by arcadeisland found here: https://arcadeisland.itch.io/space-shooter-wang-tiles

Font, audio, and planet* sprites by Kenny found here: Kenney • Free game assets

*Planet sprites are scaled down from the original

Please excuse the different scaling of the UI. It is not bound by the camera settings that I use to create the resolution.
